official_title: A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
short_title: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2009
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2009 - Amends federal law concerning federal workers' compensation to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.

titles.title: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2009
A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
